markdownRemark.html:
How do I create a new React project?

That depends on what your looking for out of the box. No config, config, server-rendered etcâ€¦ here are a few to consider. Of course you can setup from scratch as well (not covered here).

  • create-react-app No configuration or complicated folder structures, just the files you need to build your app.
#install create-react-app if you don't have it
npm install -g create-react-app

#create a new app
create-react-app my-app
cd my-app/

#start the app - have fun!
npm start
  • nwb Create React apps with no configuration (until you need it)
  • next.js A minimalistic framework for universal server-rendered React applications
  • react-server Batteries-included Server-rendered React applications. Note: also see React 30 -> 002 - Streaming React
  • react-boilerplate A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices
  • create-react-pwa + Progressive Web App goodness
  • Gatsby Transform plain text into dynamic blogs and websites using React.js (used for this website!)
  • The Minimal React Webpack Babel Setup @rwieruch

Also see these projects
